text: Mark Brown is a Cook Islands politician. He has been the Prime Minister of the Cook Islands since 1 October 2020. He was Deputy Prime Minister under Henry Puna. He is a member of the Cook Islands Party. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of the Cook Islands Category:Current national leaders Category:University of the South Pacific alumni Category:1963 births Category:New Zealand people
title: Mark Brown (Cook Islands)
